title: Loan for Engine Valve Manufacturing and Sales Business of Japanese Company in India : Supporting ...
text: ( Source : JBIC - Japan Bank for International Cooperation ) The Japan Bank for International Cooperation (JBIC; Governor , CEO : Hiroshi Watanabe ) signed on October 8, a loan agreement amounting up to approximately INR170 million (JBIC portion)
